ValidationRule.description: Validates Staff Email field if unique. Must not be the same with Email, Student Email, or Work Email.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( NOT (ISBLANK(QUT_Staff_Email__c) ), OR( IF(QUT_Staff_Email__c = Email, true, false) , IF(QUT_Staff_Email__c = QUT_Learner_Email__c, true, false) , IF(QUT_Staff_Email__c = hed__WorkEmail__c, true, false) ) )
